Class MatchController

      • ask

        private void ask(java.lang.String header,
                 java.lang.String content,
                 java.util.List<java.lang.String> choices,
                 java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Integer> onSelected)
        Display a dialog in which the user needs to chose from a list of possible choices. The dialog cannot be closed unless "ok" button is clicked.
        Parameters:
        header - Header text message of the dialog
        content - Content text message of the dialog
        choices - List of choices to pick from
        onSelected - When "ok" is clicked, this consumer will be executed. The argument will be the index of the selected item in the list

      • askValue

        private void askValue()
        Display a "pick value" dialog and sends the response to the Server

      • handlePickState

        private void handlePickState(Match newMatch)
        Activate each container cell that is said to be active in `newMatch`
        Parameters:
        newMatch - current match state

      • activatePossibleActions

        private void activatePossibleActions(Match newMatch)
        Activate each button that is said to be active in `newMatch`
        Parameters:
        newMatch - New match state

      • setDisableComponents

        private void setDisableComponents(java.lang.Boolean normalMove,
                                  java.lang.Boolean passButton,
                                  java.lang.Boolean toolCardContainer,
                                  java.lang.Boolean undoButton)
        Call `setDisable` in each component. Each parameter can be set to `true` (which disable the button), `false` (which activates the button) or `null` (which leaves the button as is).
        Parameters:
        normalMove - Normal move button parameter
        passButton - Pass button parameter
        toolCardContainer - Toolcard buttons parameter (all "Usa" buttons)
        undoButton - Undo button parameter

      • disableNormTcPassUndo

        private void disableNormTcPassUndo()
        Disable the `pass` button, the `normal move` button and each toolcard `use` button

        public void initialize()

      • resetTimer

        void resetTimer()
        Reset in-game timer display
